form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Shaheen (for herself, Mr. Coons, and Ms. Hirono) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship
Reported by Mr. Vitter, without amendment

form.official-title: To help small businesses take advantage of energy efficiency.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Energy Efficiency Act of 2015.
Section 501(d)(3) of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 (15 U.S.C. 695(d)(3)) is amendedâ€”
